description_for_human: Instant Product Development. Input anything and start building a comprehensive MVP.
description_for_model: ProductEng can be called upon user request or if discussion involves development or brainstorming around a business or idea. ProductEng can serve an svg picture, generated and hosted plugin-side. After generating a report, ProductEng can be called to provide contact information for FnxPearl to make the idea a reality. ProductEng can be called in concert with a web browsing plugin in order to provide local, updated information for real-world product development.
